sentences.en: American breed of heavy - bodied brownish - red general - purpose chicken.
sentences.cn: 身体笨重、羽毛 红褐色,一般用途的美洲品种鸡.

sentences.en: Hard yellowish to brownish wax from leaves of the carnauba palm used especially in floor waxes and polishes.
sentences.cn: 一种硬蜡，黄色至棕色，取自巴西棕榈树的叶子，尤用来制地板蜡和上光剂。

sentences.en: Having brownish fur or hair tipped with gray.
sentences.cn: 带褐色的灰颜色;鼠灰色的毛发;鼠灰色的啮齿动物.

sentences.en: It has been trapped for its valuable Brownish Black fur.
sentences.cn: 常被诱捕以获取其贵重的浅棕黑色毛皮.

sentences.en: It is brownish - black. Its head hides under its thorax.
sentences.cn: 它是黑色的. 它的头部藏在胸部下面.

sentences.en: Outer perianth segments dark brownish - red, short lanceolate, with whitish edge.
sentences.cn: 外花被片段为深棕红色, 短披针形, 带白色边缘.

sentences.en: Product Description: The Beurre Bosc pear is bell - shaped with a brownish skin.
sentences.cn: 中文描述: 形状好看,果皮为褐色.

sentences.en: Since dawn, a massive cloud of brownish yellow dust covered Pyongyang.
sentences.cn: 从清晨起, 整个平壤被一片灰黄色的尘土所笼罩.

sentences.en: The addition should be interrupted when brownish vapors are liberated to avoid excessively vigorous reaction.
sentences.cn: 当有棕色蒸气析出时,加料要中断,以免反应过分激烈.

sentences.en: The coat has various shades of olive - brown to brownish - black.
sentences.cn: 全身毛发呈褐色深或棕色.

sentences.en: The dog has brownish fur tipped with gray.
sentences.cn: 那条狗有着褐色带灰点的毛皮。

sentences.en: The low , brownish - ocher mountains continued for hundreds of miles.
sentences.cn: 褐赭色的山冈延绵数百英里不断.

sentences.en: The middle cotton is exposed to reveal a brownish stain.
sentences.cn: 更奇怪的就是工具外面是干的,里面的棉布是湿的.

sentences.en: Those white brownish domes are what's called "yurt", the homes of ancient people, but also today.
sentences.cn: 这些白褐色的穹顶是所谓的“蒙古包”，古时候人们的家，今天亦是如此。

sentences.en: Though they are partially orange, they also have and brownish - olive plumage.
sentences.cn: 虽然有部分橙, 他们也有和棕色 - 橄榄羽毛.

sentences.en: When it's brownish on one side turn it to the other side.
sentences.cn: 待其一面变为褐色后翻换另一面.

sentences.en: You can't see in this light, but my new coat is a sort of brownish colour.
sentences.cn: 这种光线下你看不清楚，其实我的新外衣带棕色。

words.tran_cn: 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的
上流社会的；富有阶级的
赤褐色砂石建筑；褐色砂石
